author: Staff Reporter
text:
A total of 132 vehicles that were seized by the city police from miscreants involved in various cases will be auctioned at the PRS Ground here on February 17.

The auction will be carried out in the presence of the Tahsildar (South) from 11 a.m. Interested persons can see the vehicles on the day of auctioning and the previous day.

Deposit

Bidders should pay 10 per cent of the value of the vehicle as a deposit and take part in the auction. Highest bidder should pay the money after deducting the deposit. The deposit will be refunded to those who did not buy any vehicle.
title: Seized vehicles to be auctioned
